name: Immersive pages
description:
Immersive pages is a VR experience that will aim to link the world of books and immerging technology.

The vision of the solution is to showcase book synopsis for different categories and authors with the main aim of encouraging the general public to take up reading. 

It is intended as an additional marketing strategy for authors or publishes to further familiarize their intended audience with the imaginative world and character present in their books.
